H0.text: Electric Christmas tree lights were first used in what year. 1870

H1.text: Electric Christmas tree lights were first used in what year. 1875

H2.text: Electric Christmas tree lights were first used in what year. 1879

H3.text: Electric Christmas tree lights were first used in what year. 1882

A4.text: In December 1882 at his home near Fifth Avenue in New York City, Edward H. Johnson had Christmas tree light bulbs especially made for him and displayed his Christmas tree, which was hand-wired with 80 red, white and blue electric incandescent light bulbs the size of walnuts.

A5.text: The first known electrically illuminated Christmas tree was the creation of Edward H. Johnson, an associate of inventor Thomas Edison.
